description: Probably from Italian rucola, whence also, since c. 1967, English rucola. Also cognate to rocket (“plant”), eruca, roquette.

definitionGroups.group: One of three yellowish-flowered Mediterranean herbs of the mustard family with flavoured leaves, often eaten in salads. Has a distinct, peppery flavor:

entries.meaning: Eruca sativa, sometimes Eruca vesicaria subsp. sativa
